nl.corebooster.setup

Class AnimatedSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.corebooster.setup.AnimatedSprite

  • public class AnimatedSprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes an animated tile from the game with an X and Y position
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymon de Looff, Thijs Clowting, Richard Weug

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new animated sprite from a spritesheet with a trigger

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(java.lang.String folder,
                      java.lang.String filename,
                      boolean isCollidable,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      int interval)
               throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Constructs a new animated sprite from a spritesheet
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder where the spritesheet is located
        filename - The filename of the spritesheet
        isCollidable - Depends if you can collide with the animated sprite or not, true/false
        x - The initial x position of the animated sprite
        y - The initial y position of the animated sprite
        width - The width of the animated sprite
        height - The height of the animated sprite
        interval - The animation interval
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(java.lang.String folder,
                      java.lang.String filename,
                      boolean isCollidable,
                      TriggerBox.TriggerType triggerType,
                      java.lang.String triggerValue,
                      int triggerMargin,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      int interval)
               throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Constructs a new animated sprite from a spritesheet with a trigger
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder where the spritesheet is located
        filename - The filename of the spritesheet
        isCollidable - Depends if you can collide with the animated sprite or not, true/false
        triggerType - The type of trigger called when collided, SCENESWITCH/MESSAGE
        triggerValue - The value of the trigger called when collided
        triggerMargin - The margin of the trigger box
        x - The initial x position of the animated sprite
        y - The initial y position of the animated sprite
        width - The width of the animated sprite
        height - The height of the animated sprite
        interval - The animation interval
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • getSpriteSheet

        public org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet getSpriteSheet(java.lang.String folder,
                                                    java.lang.String filename,
                                                    int width,
                                                    int height)
                                             throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Gets a spritesheet image from the given location
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder where the spritesheet is located
        filename - The filename of the spritesheet
        width - The width of the animated sprite that can be created out of the spritesheet
        height - The height of the animated sprite that can be created out of the spritesheet
        Returns:
        The newly created spritesheet
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
